Entries.default: "Welcome to my emporium." He gestures at all the stalls around him. "Whatever you need, I sell."
"What would you like to buy today?"
"Show me what you have for sale."
"I do now! I started out with only one stall and eventually branched out, buying out my competitors one by one."
"A friend of the Pr√≠ncipi is always welcome in my emporium."
"You're quite the troublemaker, I've heard. I hope I stay on your good side!" He laughs nervously.
"Please don't damage anything. I want no trouble."
